verses.name: Mark 10:46
verses.text: And they came to Jericho: and as he went out of Jericho with his disciples and a great number of people, blind Bartimeus, the son of Timeus, sat by the highway side begging.

verses.name: Mark 10:47
verses.text: And when he heard that it was Jesus of Nazareth, he began to cry out, and say, Jesus, thou Son of David, have mercy on me.

verses.name: Mark 10:48
verses.text: And many charged him that he should hold his peace: but he cried the more a great deal, Thou Son of David, have mercy on me.
